akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 115–282, title VI, § 601(c)(3)(A), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4289]

akn:content.akn:p:
[§ 8108. Repealed. Pub. L. 115–282, title VI, § 601(c)(3)(A), Dec. 4, 2018, 132 Stat. 4289]
Section, added Pub. L. 113–281, title III, § 310(a), Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 3045; amended Pub. L. 115–232, div. C, title XXXV, § 3541(b)(14), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 2323, established the Merchant Marine Personnel Advisory Committee. See section 15103 of this title.
